text:
Hi,
I'm Fabian doing a PhD on forest soil hydrology at WSL/ETHZ in Switzerland. Using data from long term monitoring plots and additionally stable isotopes I will use Bayesian parameter estimation of porous flow and transport model parameters in <https://github.com/fabern/LWFBrook90.jl|LWFBrook.jl>.
